title: Game crashes after entering a game.Help?
body: Ok to make this clear ill start from the beggining.Im always afraid to go into a game because the game might start crashing.I always go play bots for 5 mins to be sure the game doesnt crash.Somedays it crashes somedays it doesnt Example:Yesterday i played normaly like 5-10 games no lags no bugs maybe only some fps drops but those dont happen so often. Example2:Today i started testing in costum game that do i hav crashes or not and today i did have crashes.Crashes are like over a day or a week straight.I hope somebody can help.

replies.body: What do you mean exactly by crashing?  Are  you getting any error messages?  When is it happening?
Im going into a game and play for 30sec or way less and then it just starts crashing.The game freezes or screen just gonna go black and this only happens.

It sounds like you might be having a connection issue that's cutting you off.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help!  Make sure to go thruogh each step to rule out possibilities.  Let me know if you have any questions!
